mapper.select: SELECT sum(cnt) as cnt, cart_no, m_id, PC.pro_no, C.title, pro_name, category, color, size, P.price, P.postername, p_id FROM product_cart PC JOIN product P ON PC.pro_no = P.pro_no JOIN concert C ON P.c_no = C.c_no WHERE m_id = #{m_id} GROUP BY PC.pro_no ORDER BY p_id, cart_no DESC
SELECT sum(P.price) AS ptotal FROM product_cart PC JOIN product P ON PC.pro_no = P.pro_no JOIN concert C ON P.c_no = C.c_no WHERE m_id = #{m_id} GROUP BY p_id
